title:
An Inverse Hyperbolic Problem with Application to Joint Photoacoustic
  Parameter Determination
authors: Shitao Liu, Gunther Uhlmann, Yang Yang
abstract:
We consider an inverse problem of recovering a parameter appearing in all
levels in a second-order hyperbolic equation from a single boundary
measurement. The model is motivated from applications in photoacoustic
tomography when one seeks to recover both the wave speed and the initial
ultrasound pressure from a single ultrasound signal. In particular, our result
shows that the ratio of the initial ultrasound pressure and the wave speed
squared uniquely determines both of them respectively.
